attributes.action: Invite Her Majesty's Police to Investigate Irregularities in Members Expense Claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many upright Members of Parliament are having their reputations tarnished by the excessive claims of expenses of other Members of Parliament.

We call on the Prime Minister to invite the Police to commence a full investigation of MPs expenses to prosecute any instances of fraud and to exonerate those who have committed no offence.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
